Title: Trump's 'Liberation Day' Creates 'Major Uncertainty' For Big Tech, Analyst Dan Ives Says
Summary: Analyst Dan Ives warns that President Trump's tariff announcements could create major uncertainty for big tech companies, potentially slowing AI spending and disrupting semiconductor supply chains due to potential retaliation from China.

Title: EXCLUSIVE: Tema ETF Tackles Mag 7 Concentration Risk With New S&P 500 Historical Weighting Strategy
Summary: Tema ETF has introduced a new ETF, DSPY, that reweights the S&P 500 index using historical average weights instead of current market cap. This aims to reduce the concentration risk in the index caused by the dominance of the 'Magnificent Seven' tech giants.

Title: Meet the Hard Asset That's Bigger Than Apple, Nvidia, and Microsoft Combined. One Wall Street Strategist Thinks It Could Hit a $40 Trillion Market Cap.
Summary: The article discusses how gold, a hard asset, has outperformed major tech stocks like Apple, Nvidia, and Microsoft, and could potentially reach a $40 trillion market cap according to a Wall Street strategist. The article cites concerns about the U.S. government's growing debt and fiscal deficit as factors driving the rise in gold prices.

Title: 37% of Warren Buffett's $290 Billion Berkshire Hathaway Portfolio Is Invested in These 2 S&P 500 Dividend Stocks
Summary: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has a concentrated portfolio, with 37% invested in just two S&P 500 dividend stocks: Apple and American Express. Buffett has been reducing his Apple position, but the company remains Berkshire's largest holding, while American Express is the second-largest.
